definition: (technical) manual/(book of) directions/synopsis (of a play or film)/specification (patent)/CL:本[ben3]
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: It's better for you to view the leaflet before you make any decision.
sentences.chinese: 你最好在決定保什麼險之前先看看說明書。

sentences.english: The main part of the design specifications, calculations and chart form.
sentences.chinese: 本次設計主要部分由說明書，計算書和圖組成。

sentences.english: Oh, the spec says it should work this way.
sentences.chinese: 哦，規格說明書上說它應該“這樣”工作。

sentences.english: Bill said that if he had the instruction manual he would know what to do.
sentences.chinese: 比爾說如果他有說明書他就知道該怎麼弄了。

sentences.english: When buying new, keep all the paperwork and boxes.
sentences.chinese: 購買新表時，保留所有的說明書和包裝盒。

sentences.english: Manual layout, product packaging and album design.
sentences.chinese: 產品說明書排版，產品包裝和畫冊設計。

sentences.english: Read the introduction of depilation and show you how to use it.
sentences.chinese: 閱讀女士脫毛器的說明書，然後教你怎麼用。

sentences.english: Nobody’s born with an instruction manual for life.
sentences.chinese: 沒人出生就會附贈一本生活說明書的。

sentences.english: Will you let us have the specifications?
sentences.chinese: 規格說明書可以給我們嗎。

sentences.english: The cheat sheet guides you step-by-step through the whole process.
sentences.chinese: 步驟說明書指導您逐步地通過整個過程。

sentences.english: Remove Quickstart Guide and Nook Manual from Library (yes, no)?
sentences.chinese: 是否刪除隨機帶的說明書，這個也自便。

sentences.english: Please read the operation instructions of hoisting machine.
sentences.chinese: 敬請用戶認真閱讀捲揚機使用說明書。

sentences.english: This is like having an instruction manual in which all the copies have the same typographical error.
sentences.chinese: 就好比所有說明書出現同樣的印刷錯誤。

sentences.english: Before beginning an experiment, you should read through the instructions .
sentences.chinese: 在做試驗之前你應該詳讀試驗說明書。

sentences.english: There are no assembly instructions to show you how to put the computer together.
sentences.chinese: 沒有裝配說明書，你如何把這臺計算機裝配起來。

sentences.english: If you take this assignment, take it seriously and read the instructions.
sentences.chinese: 如果你接受了這個任務，嚴肅對待它並閱讀說明書。

definition: script for play, opera, movie etc/screenplay/scenario
the only son of a family/(functional programming or philosophy) monad
to affix a seal/to stamp (a document)/to sign off on sth
body of a vehicle or machine/fuselage of a plane
